ch0160_00_suiren/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m glad I got to see you today. You and your
partner are always so full of energy!
ch0160_00_suiren/0601_0701_01_10:
Doesn’t the sight of a nice coastline just make you
want to go fishing?
ch0160_00_suiren/0601_0701_02_10:
Though I suppose we can’t fish for wild Pokémon
here on Pasio.
ch0160_00_suiren/0601_0701_04_10:
Maybe I should try reeling in a strapping young
swimmer instead.
ch0160_00_suiren/0602_0701_01_10:
My little sisters, Harper and Sarah, are such
rascals that it’s hard to keep an eye on them.
ch0160_00_suiren/0602_0701_02_10:
Sometimes they force Trainers who visit our house
to battle them...
ch0160_00_suiren/0602_0701_03_10:
But you know, they’re pretty strong even though
they’re still young!
ch0160_00_suiren/0602_0701_04_10:
I think they’re competing to see who’ll take on the
role of captain after me.
ch0160_00_suiren/0603_0701_01_10: I’m the captain of Brooklet Hill in Alola.
ch0160_00_suiren/0603_0701_02_10:
It’s a wonderful spot full of Pokémon that love
the water!
ch0160_00_suiren/0603_0701_03_10:
And if you go further in, you might even get to
see the Legendary Pokémon Kyogre.
ch0160_00_suiren/0603_0701_04_10: Just kidding! You took the bait, didn’t you!
ch0160_00_suiren/0604_0701_01_10: There are lots of Pokémon that love the rain.
ch0160_00_suiren/0604_0701_02_10:
I also feel like I can focus better while fishing if
I’m listening to the rain!
ch0160_00_suiren/0604_0701_03_10:
Watching all the ripples form on the surface of
the water while you sit and wait for a bite... It’s
nothing like fishing on a sunny day!
ch0160_00_suiren/0604_0701_04_10:
Ah, just talking about it makes me want to go
fishing again!
ch0160_00_suiren/0605_0701_02_10:
In light of that, I’ve prepared a little trial for you
as a captain!
ch0160_00_suiren/0605_0701_03_10:
Would you...come with me to try some of
Mallow’s cooking?
ch0160_00_suiren/0605_0701_04_10:
She said she’s going to prepare a full course with
fresh-picked Berries! It should be delicious. At
least, I hope it is.
ch0160_00_suiren/1701_0701_01_10:
Thanks for always helping me out! I have a
present for you!
ch0160_00_suiren/1701_0702_01_10:
Actually, it’s something I fished up from the ocean
here on Pasio.
ch0160_00_suiren/1701_0702_02_10:
I knew when I reeled it in that I wanted you to
have it, so I saved it just for you!
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0701_01_10:
Did you know that there are different types of
fishing rods?
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0701_02_10:
For example, you probably won’t be able to catch
anything big with just any old rod.
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0701_03_10:
But the fishing rods I make are high-quality.
As long as you’re using one of those, you’re in
good hands!
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0701_04_10:
If you ever clear my trial at Brooklet Hill, I’ll gladly
give you one!
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0702_01_10:
Actually, I just wanted you to have an excuse to
come visit me in Alola...
ch0160_00_suiren/2501_0702_02_10:
Plus, there are lots of great places in Alola—not
just Brooklet Hill!
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0701_01_10:
The ocean is great for fishing, and it’s also the
perfect place to swim!
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0701_02_10:
Nothing beats the feeling of floating with the
waves surrounded by Water-type Pokémon!
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0701_03_10:
Sometimes, wild Pokémon play annoying little
tricks on me...
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0701_04_10:
But I make sure to get back at them with
my Z-Power!
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0702_01_10:
Pasio’s beaches are beautiful, and they don’t have
any mischievous Pokémon playing tricks on people,
so they’re the perfect place to hang out!
ch0160_00_suiren/2511_0702_02_10:
I even promised Mallow that we’d go shopping
together for some cute swimsuits.
ch0160_00_suiren/3001_0701_01_10:
You sure are a busy one, aren’t you. You didn’t
even take time to fix your bedhead this morning!
ch0160_00_suiren/3003_0701_01_10:
What a great day it is today! We should go
swimming with our Pokémon!
ch0160_00_suiren/3005_0701_01_10:
Chinchou and Lanturn’s lights shine beautifully in
the night sea of Alola.
